Key Match Events: Mattia Zaccagni scored a late equalizer to send Italy through to the last 16
Luka Modric scored a penalty to put Croatia ahead but missed another one
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Modric became the European Championship's oldest goalscorer at 38 years and 11 months
Luciano Spalletti expressed little time for expressions of negativity after the match
Zlatko Dalic introduced Ante Budimir at halftime
Alessandro Bastoni and Marcelo Brozovic had chances to score for Italy
Josko Gvardiol earned acclaim for his performance
Croatia may still have a chance to advance with favorable results from other matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: Davide Frattesi's arm was ruled not to have been involved in a penalty
A header over by Alessandro Bastoni was saved by Dominik Livakovic
